title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 461.1 - Definitions

State Regulations
(a) Home-delivered
meals means one or more meals, one of which shall be hot, delivered daily to a
person in his own home. (b) His own
home means his legal residence, but does not mean group residence or
health-related facility. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
461.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
